entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
